messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] active/alert+spirited?
messages.msgSnippet: Julie: I think that bascially an acitve/alert child is a highly spirited child.  The thing is that as a parent of this type of child, it is important to
messages.messageBody:
Julie:

I think that bascially an acitve/alert child is a highly spirited child. The
thing is that as a parent of this type of child, it is important to recognize
their gifts and focus on those. It is also very important that they be
disciplined and/or taught in a positive and loving way. It sounds to me
though, as if you already have a wonderfully positive attitude towards your
child.

Hugz,
Amy
